name: Kill The King
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE 

(YOU NEED AN OCULUS QUEST TO PLAY)

A few things going forward

  • There will be bugs
  • Hand-Tracking is not perfect
  • This is a prototype and not a full game
  • If there is interest in the project, I will continue updates

If you have feedback for this project, please comment and let me know how you think the game could be improved.

Description

Kill the King is a hand tracking demo for the oculus quest; your objective is to combine creatures and build an empire. The game is heavily influenced by clicker games, I.E. (Cookie Clicker) once the King spawns throw him off the level and try to beat your time.
